TCName.name: SalesColumnValidation
TCName.PlannedSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (/*select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION*/ select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' )*/ and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) /*and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g*/) sec_prty) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no
TCName.ActualSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no not IN (0,20,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no not IN (0,20,90) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no not IN (0,20,90) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no not IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.loc_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.loc_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no not IN (0,20,90) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e )*/ ) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no

TCName.LYSalesPct: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TCName.BudgetSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_WTSG,0) as BDGT_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(bdgt.BDGT_SALES_TOT_WTSG,0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,ROUND(sum(e.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_TOT_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ForecastSales: select lc.ar_no,NVL(fcst.FCST_SALES_WTSG,0) as FCST_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,ROUND(sum(e.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SALES_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no

mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and TCName.PctLastYrCustomers: select lc.ar_no, CASE WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 THEN -100 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(cyly_wtd.cy_wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(cyly_wtd.ly_wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(((cyly_wtd.cy_wtd / cyly_wtd.ly_wtd)-1)*100,2) END as ACTL_LY_PCT_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select cy_val.ar_no,sum(cy_val.WTD) as cy_wtd,sum(ly_val.WTD) as ly_wtd from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.ACTL_CUST_WTSG,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_CUST_DTS) as ACTL_CUST_WTSG from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_cust_cnt) as ACTL_CUST_DTS from (select actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no IN (90,85) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_cust_cnt is NOT NULL and a.actl_cust_cnt!=0) e )*/ ) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) itm on lc.zone_no=itm.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) nume_den

TCName.name: HoursColumnValidation
TCName.ActualHours: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,2),0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedHours: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,2),0) as PLN_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,2),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.VarHours: select pln.ar_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_HRS_WTSG - pln.PLN_HRS_WTSG),2) as VAR_HRS_WTSG from (select z.ar_no,NVL(y.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no) pln, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl where pln.ar_no=actl.ar_no
TCName.VarHoursTotal: select pln.zone_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG - pln.PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG),2) as VAR_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(hrs.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no

TCName.name: WagesColumnValidation
TCName.ActualWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_WGE_DTS,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.loc_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) hrs on hrs.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(hrs.ACTL_WGE_DTS,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) hrs on hrs.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.CurrentActualWages: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.ACTL_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.CurrentActualWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(y.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where a.loc_no='store' and dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) y on lc.zone_no=y.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ActualWagePercentage: select nume_den.ar_no, CASE When nume_den.ACTL_WGE_WTSG=0 Then 0 when nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE ROUND((nume_den.ACTL_WGE_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG)*100,2) END as ACTL_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select nume.ar_no,NVL(nume.ACTL_WGE_WTSG,0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG,NVL(den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_WGE_DTS,0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) den where nume.ar_no=den.ar_no) nume_den
TCName.BudgetWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(bdgt.BDGT_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.bdgt_wage_amt) as BDGT_WAGE_TOT_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWages: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(fcst.FCST_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as FCST_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(fcst.FCST_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,0),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.frcst_wage_amt) as FCST_WAGE_TOT_WTSG from (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.BudgetWagePercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE When wge.BDGT_WGE_WTSG=0 Then 0 When sls.BDGT_SLS_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_WTSG / sls.BDGT_SLS_WTSG)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no
TCName.BudgetWagePercentageTotal: select wge.zone_no, CASE When wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 When sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_WTSG / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100,2),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentage: select wge.ar_no, CASE When wge.FCST_WGE_WTSG=0 Then 0 When sls.FCST_SLS_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_WTSG / sls.FCST_SLS_WTSG)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.ar_no=fcst.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no
TCName.ForecastWagePercentageTotal: select wge.zone_no, CASE When wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 When sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100,2),0) END as FCST_WGE_PCT_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no
TCName.PlannedWages: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no

as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no) wge, (select z.ar_no,NVL(y.PLN_SLS_WTSG,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_WTSG) as TCName.PlannedCPH: select lc.ar_no, CASE When NVL(wge.PLN_WAGE_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.PLN_HOURS_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.PLN_WAGE_WTSG / wge.PLN_HOURS_WTSG),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on lc.ar_no=wge.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE When NVL(wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG / wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG),2),0) END as PLN_CPH_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ActualCPH: select lc.ar_no, CASE When NVL(wge.ACTL_WAGE_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.ACTL_HOURS_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.ACTL_WAGE_WTSG / wge.ACTL_HOURS_WTSG),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_WTSG,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.ActualCPHTotal: select lc.zone_no, CASE When NVL(wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.ACTL_HOURS_TOT_WTSG,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.ACTL_WAGE_TOT_WTSG / wge.ACTL_HOURS_TOT_WTSG),2),0) END as ACTL_CPH_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_TOT_WTSG,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_TOT_WTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.VarWages: select pln.ar_no,ROUND((actl.ACTL_WGE_PCT_WTSG - pln.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WTSG),2) as VAR_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select nume_den.ar_no, CASE When nume_den.ACTL_WGE_WTSG=0 Then 0 when nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE ((nume_den.ACTL_WGE_WTSG / nume_den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG)*100) END as ACTL_WGE_PCT_WTSG from (select nume.ar_no,NVL(nume.ACTL_WGE_WTSG,0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG,NVL(den.ACTL_SLS_WTSG,0) as ACTL_SLS_WTSG from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_WGE_DTS,0) as ACTL_WGE_WTSG from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.refcst_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.refcst_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.refcst_sls,0) as refcst_sls,nvl(a.refcst_itm_cnt,0) as refcst_itm_cnt,nvl(a.refcst_cust_cnt,0) as refcst_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.pln_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.pln_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) pri_prty UNION select * from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.pln_dte from mgr_dly_refcst a, loc b, wk c where a.pln_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) den where nume.zone_no=den.zone_no) nume_den) actl, (select wge.zone_no, CASE When wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 When sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(((wge.FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG / sls.FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG)*100),0) END as FCST_WGE_PCT_TOT_WTSG from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_wage_amt),0) as FCST_WGE_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(fcst.frcst_sls),0) as FCST_SLS_TOT_WTSG from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from mnth_fcst a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) fcst on lc.zone_no=fcst.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) pln where pln.zone_no=actl.zone_no
TCName.AllowedWages:
select src.ar_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_MTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ * BDGT_SLS_MTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_MTSZ - BDGT_SLS_MTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_MTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_MTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ * BDGT_SLS_MTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_MTSZ - BDGT_SLS_MTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_MTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ * ACTL_SLS_MTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_MTSZ from
(select actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_MTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_MTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_MTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_MTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ from
(select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_MTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_MTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_MTSZ from (select * from (select e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk order by e.loc_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) sls on lc.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_MTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_MTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekStart') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekStart') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_MTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_MTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_MTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_MTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_MTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_MTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_MTSZ from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_MTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_MTSZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.ar_no=bdgt.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no order by actl_sls.ar_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.ar_no
TCName.AllowedWagesTotal:
select src.zone_no, case when src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ > src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ) * (PST_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ)))/100),0),0) When src.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ < src.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ then NVL(ROUND((((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ * BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ) + ((ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ - BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ) * (NGT_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ * BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ)))/100),0),0) else NVL(ROUND(((BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ * ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ)/100),0),0) end as ALWD_WGE_TOT_MTSZ from
(select actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id,actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ,rte_fct.PST_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ,rte_fct.NGT_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ, bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ,bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ from
(select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ,0),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.zone_no,sum(h.ACTL_SLS_DTS) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MTSZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as ACTL_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.zone_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f) h group by h.zone_no order by h.zone_no) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) actl_sls,
(select lc.wk_id,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as PST_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as NGT_FACTOR_TOT_MTSZ from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekStart') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekStart') and rgn_no in (99) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) rte_fct,
(select wge.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ, NVL(ROUND(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ, CASE When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ,0)=0 and NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 When NVL(sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ,0)=0 Then 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ / sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ)*100,5),0) END as BDGT_WGE_PCT_TOT_MTSZ from (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) wge, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(sum(bdgt.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MTSZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,a.*,c.perd_desc,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm from wky_bdgt a, loc b, wk c, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id between 'WeekStart' and 'WeekEnd' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,0,90) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.wk_id,d.dply_seq) bdgt on lc.zone_no=bdgt.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no) bdgt_wge_pct
where actl_sls.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no order by actl_sls.zone_no,rte_fct.wk_id) src order by src.zone_no
